strings.situationUpdateSectionHeading: Provide any updates in the situation since the field report and explain what is expected to happen.
strings.anticipatoryActionsHeading: Why your National Society is acting now and what criteria is used to launch this operation.

strings.changingStrategyLabel: Are you changing the operational strategy
strings.changingTargetPopulationLabel: Are you changing the target population of the operation
strings.changingLocationLabel: Are you changing the geographical location
strings.changingBudgetLabel: Are you making changes to the budget
strings.secondAllocationLabel: Is this a request for a second allocation
strings.changeSummaryLabel: Please explain the summary of changes and justification
strings.specifiedTriggerMetLabel: Please explain how the operation is transitioning from Anticipatory to Response

strings.otherActionsHeading: Other Actors Actions Related To The Current Event
strings.majorCoordinationMechanismLabel: Are there major coordination mechanism in place?
strings.identifiedGapsHeading: Any identified gaps/limitations in the assessment
strings.peopleAssistedHeading: Who will be targeted through this operation?
strings.selectionCriteriaHeading: Explain the selection criteria for the targeted population
strings.riskSecurityHeading: Please indicate about potential operation risk for this operations and mitigation actions
strings.safetyConcernHeading: Please indicate any security and safety concerns for this operation
strings.humanResourcesHeading: How many staff and volunteers will be involved in this operation. Briefly describe their role.
strings.surgePersonnelDeployedHeading: Will surge personnel be deployed? Please provide the role profile needed.
strings.logisticCapacityHeading: If there is procurement, will it be done by National Society or IFRC?
strings.pmerHeading: How will this operation be monitored?
